mapper.select: select id,check_user_id,machine_id,type,create_time from inno72_check_sign_in where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y%M') = DATE_FORMAT(#{createTime},'%Y%M') and machine_id=#{machineId} and check_user_id=#{checkUserId}

select t1.id machineId, t1.machine_code machineCode, t1.machine_name machineName, CONCAT( t5.province, t5.city, t5.district, if(t5.circle='其他' or t5.circle is null,'',t5.circle),IFNULL(t4.mall,""),IFNULL( t4.name,'') ) AS localeStr, t3.* from inno72_machine t1 left join inno72_check_user_machine t2 on t1.id = t2.machine_id left join inno72_check_sign_in t3 on t2.machine_id=t3.machine_id and date_format(t3.create_time,'%Y%M%D') = date_format(CURRENT_DATE,'%Y%M%D') and t3.check_user_id=#{checkUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN inno72_locale t4 ON t4.id = t1.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area t5 ON t5.CODE = t4.area_code where t2.check_user_id = #{checkUserId} order by t3.create_time desc

select csi.check_user_id checkUserId,DATE_FORMAT(csi.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') signDateStr ,1 AS type,csi.machine_id machineId,DATE_FORMAT(csi.create_time, '%H:%m:%s') as signTimeStr from inno72_check_sign_in csi where csi.check_user_id=#{checkUserId} and csi.machine_id=#{machineId} and DATE_FORMAT(csi.create_time,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(#{signDateStr},'%Y%m') UNION all select cf.submit_id checkUserId,DATE_FORMAT(cf.submit_time,'%Y-%m-%d') signDateStr ,2 AS type,cf.machine_id machineId,DATE_FORMAT(cf.submit_time, '%H:%m:%s') as signTimeStr from inno72_check_fault cf where cf.submit_id=#{checkUserId} and cf.machine_id=#{machineId} and DATE_FORMAT(cf.submit_time,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(#{signDateStr},'%Y%m')
